channel.title: Epic Modz
channel.description:
Ok so I do not want spam please but heres what you need to follow:: {Post like this}:::
Fav Mod- (1) Disliked Mods- (1-2) People who should be mod but arent- (1-3) Dont put all these words just put....(heres mine)
1. The Soul (Fav) 2. Fat Cookies (Disliked) 3. Davidi2, Project Evolution (Should be Mod)

item.title: Epic Modz
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Pointless topic this is. If you want to know which moderator people despise and like, ask them via PM. Also it is unfair to ‘despise’ a moderator for doing his job. Nobody will ever be let off just because they’ll have a lower opinion of us when we take action.

Read full topic

item.title: Epic Modz

@marcbob wrote:

I hope your fav mod will lock this.

They all are my favs because they do a good job. If any of them I dont like it is only when they are inactive.

Alot of people should be promoted even if it is only community member but I dont want to ruin their chances.

item.title: Epic Modz

item.description:
@pl0x15 wrote:

Btw Jmood I didnt say anything like this. As above I’m only seeing who thinks deserves im not trying to get people to become Mod dumbfucks. I’m just seeing whos the Mopar Favorite around here. God gtfo my topic prickz.
